meanings.definition: A person who assists a librarian in their duties.
meanings.sent1: The sublibrarians helped organize the library books.
meanings.sent2: The sublibrarians checked in the returned books at the library.
meanings.sent3: The sublibrarians accidentally mixed up the fiction and non-fiction sections.
meanings.sent4: The sublibrarians were the unsung heroes of the library, keeping everything in order.
meanings.sent5: The diligent sublibrarians diligently sorted the books by genre.

meanings.definition: The group of individuals who work under the supervision of a librarian.
meanings.sent1: All the sublibrarians gathered for a meeting with the head librarian.
meanings.sent2: The sublibrarians were responsible for shelving books and assisting patrons.
meanings.sent3: The sublibrarians jokingly called themselves the 'book brigade'.
meanings.sent4: The sublibrarians formed a tight-knit team, supporting each other like family.
meanings.sent5: The dedicated sublibrarians worked together harmoniously to maintain the library.
